sqlMap.insert: insert into eos_dict_type (dicttypeid, dicttypename, rank, parentid, seqno) values(#dicttypeid:VARCHAR#, #dicttypename:VARCHAR#, #rank:VARCHAR#, #parentid:VARCHAR#, #seqno:VARCHAR#)
sqlMap.delete: delete from eos_dict_type t where t.dicttypeid = #dicttypeid:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.update: update eos_dict_type t set t.dicttypename = #dicttypename:VARCHAR# where 1=1 and t.dicttypeid = #dicttypeid:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.select:
select t.dicttypeid as "dicttypeid", t.dicttypename as "dicttypename" from eos_dict_type t where 1=1
and t.dicttypeid like '%' || #dicttypeid# || '%'
and t.dicttypename like '%' || #dicttypename:VARCHAR# || '%'
order by t.dicttypeid

select t.dicttypeid as "dicttypeid", t.dicttypename as "dicttypename" from eos_dict_type t where 1=1
and t.dicttypeid = #dicttypeid:VARCHAR#
and t.dicttypename like '%' || #dicttypename:VARCHAR# || '%'
order by t.dicttypeid

select count(1) from eos_dict_type t where 1=1
and t.dicttypeid like '%' || #dicttypeid:VARCHAR# ||'%'
and t.dicttypename like '%' || #dicttypename:VARCHAR# || '%'
sqlMap.insert: insert into eos_dict_entry (dicttypeid, dictid, dictname, status, sortno, rank, parentid, seqno, filter1, filter2) values (#dicttypeid:VARCHAR#, #dictid:VARCHAR#, #dictname:VARCHAR#, #status:VARCHAR#, #sortno:DECIMAL:-9999#, #rank:VARCHAR#, #parentid:VARCHAR#, #seqno:VARCHAR#, #filter1:VARCHAR#, #filter2:VARCHAR#)
sqlMap.delete:
delete from eos_dict_entry t where 1=1
and t.dicttypeid = #dicttypeid:VARCHAR#
and dictid = #dictid:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.update:
update eos_dict_entry t set t.dictname = #dictname:VARCHAR#, t.status = #status:DECIMAL#, t.sortno = #sortno:DECIMAL:-9999# where 1=1 and t.dicttypeid = #dicttypeid:VARCHAR# and t.dictid = #dictid:VARCHAR#
and t.parentid = #parentid:VARCHAR#
and t.parentid is null
sqlMap.select:
select count(1) from eos_dict_entry t where 1=1
and t.dicttypeid = #dicttypeid:VARCHAR#
and t.parentid = #parentid:VARCHAR#
and t.parentid is null

select t.dicttypeid as "dicttypeid", t.dictid as "dictid", t.dictname as "dictname", t.parentid as "parentid", t.status as "status", t.sortno as "sortno" from eos_dict_entry t where 1=1
and t.dicttypeid = #dicttypeid:VARCHAR#
and t.dictid = #dictid:VARCHAR#
and t.parentid = #parentid:VARCHAR#
and t.parentid is null
order by t.sortno,t.dictid

select t.dicttypeid as "dicttypeid", t.dictid as "dictid", t.dictname as "dictname", t.status as "status", t.sortno as "sortno" from eos_dict_entry t where 1=1
and t.dicttypeid = #dicttypeid:VARCHAR#
and t.parentid = #parentid:VARCHAR#
and t.parentid is null
order by t.sortno,t.dictid
